panels.title: XDS Config Shared Dict Free Space

targets.expr: sum(irate(apisix_http_status{instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod",code!~"5.*"}[5m])) by (pod, namespace) / sum(irate(apisix_http_status{instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (pod, namespace)

panels.title: Requests per second (RPS) by status code

targets.legendFormat: bytes of memory are used for other runtime allocations ({{namespace}}/{{pod}})

panels.description: shows how many heap objects are allocated. This is a counter value so you can use rate() to objects allocated/s.
panels.title: Rate of Objects Allocated

panels.description: go_memstats_lookups_total – counts how many pointer dereferences happened. This is a counter value so you can use rate() to lookups/s.
panels.title: Rate of a Pointer Dereferences
